title: Crayfish stuffed chicken breast in rich mushroom cream sauce
ingredients: ['8 skinless, boneless chicken breast fillets', '225ml Worcestershire sauce', '450g unsalted butter, divided', '150g diced onion', '125g diced celery', '75g diced green pepper', '3 tablespoons minced garlic', '450g cooked and peeled crawfish tails, coarsely chopped', 'salt', 'black pepper', '125g plain flour', '475ml whipping cream', '325g fresh oyster mushrooms, stemmed and sliced', '275g fresh lump crab meat', '100g diced spring onion']
